Crown of Ptah

protection, head [prothead]: 9
magic resistance [mr]: +3
morale bonus [morale]: +4
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #292 Power of the Sepulchre
spell [itemspell]: #1019 Control the Dead
fear [fear]: +10
(unremovable [cursed], curses-bearer [curse], crown [crown])

Item cannot be forged.

Ptah was an evil tyrant who ruled with an iron fist and an army of undead. He made this crown to strengthen his control over the dead and bring fear to his subjects.
